languages.text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, бичевание 10). Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равный значению бичевания, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
languages.original_text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, бичевание 10). Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равный значению бичевания, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

traits.locale_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

languages.text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Geißelnd 10). Feinde, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Geißelnd. Dieser Abzug wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Geißelnd 10). Feinde, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Geißelnd. Dieser Abzug wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.

Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Geißelnd 10). Feinde, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Geißelnd. Dieser Abzug wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.

languages.text: L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Fustigation 10. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} égale à la valeur du paramètre Fustigation s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} égale à la valeur du paramètre Fustigation s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.

L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Fustigation 10. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} égale à la valeur du paramètre Fustigation s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.

languages.text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Castigo 10). Los enemigos que son objetivo de un poder del navegante sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} igual al parámetro de castigo hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Castigo 10). Los enemigos que son objetivo de un poder del navegante sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} igual al parámetro de castigo hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.

languages.text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：非難 10）。航宙士の力のターゲットとなった敵は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで続く、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して、非難のパラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：非難 10）。航宙士の力のターゲットとなった敵は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで続く、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}に対して、非難のパラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。

languages.text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“惩戒10”）。受导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于惩戒属性值，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“惩戒10”）。受导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于惩戒属性值，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。

languages.text: Rotacı asalarının muhtemel parametrelerinden biri. Bu parametreyi her zaman sayısal bir değer takip eder (örneğin kırbaçlayıcı 10). Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} kırbaçlayıcı parametresine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, castigating 10). Enemies that become targets of the Navigator's powers suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the castigating parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
